description: The Kid's Merino Comfort Hiker is a midweight sock in a mid-crew height that will resist odor, doesn't shrink or itch, but will also provide a comfortable foot-hugging fit. We´ve created some pretty fun colors for the young ins, too!
name: Merino Comfort Hiker Socks - Kids

specs.value: 57% Merino Wool, 37% Stretch Nylon, 3% Spandex, 2% Polyester, 1% Tencel®
